body_html:
I'm running into this problem too on Docker (I'm the one who wrote the build instructions). @bryant1410, could you also post the contents of your WORKSPACE file?

The build has been working in our internal Bazel tests, so my initial assumption is that this is an environmental configuration issue of some kind.

body:
I'm running into this problem too on Docker (I'm the one who wrote the build instructions). @bryant1410, could you also post the contents of your `WORKSPACE` file?

The build has been working in our internal Bazel tests, so my initial assumption is that this is an environmental configuration issue of some kind.
